price: 16 qui, pour avoir désobéi à Notre Messager, fut violemment saisi par Notre châtiment.
arabic: فَعَصَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذۡنَٰهُ أَخۡذٗا وَبِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faʿaṣā fir'ʿawnu al-rasūla fa-akhadhnāhu akhdhan wabīlan
